website_summaries.verdict: If you are shopping for someone who loves Versace and sampling a variety of scents, this is a small but impressive set. Notes range from musk to floral, so there is a perfume to match any mood or occasion.
pros: An attractive set by Versace with three bold scents: fruity and musky Absolu, fresh-floral Bright Crystal, and citrus-scented Yellow Diamond
Bottles are eye-catching and arrive in pretty boxes
Scents linger, so a few dabs are all you need for lasting fragrance
cons: Bottles are on the small side and don't have spray applicators

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL SCENTS AND GREAT GIFT
customer_reviews.text: My order came as promised and in tact. The scents were fresh and not stale, however the bottles were smaller than I expected. They are more of a scent sampler. However, it does make for a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: KISHKA TURNER-WESLEY

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product it has a strong long lasting smell I rather buy these then the big ones. Yes they are smaller but they last a while and are worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: whitney

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for little spray bottles instead of just caps that you have to dab on yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Love this perfume
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my mom's stocking. They came quickly and are the perfect size for traveling, which is the intended use. I love this perfume!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Syms

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love versace but these mini perfumes do not have a sprayer with them and they are way too small for this price. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Variety
customer_reviews.text: Love the choice of 3 different scents, wish it was offered with more fluid oz
customer_reviews.author: JHumphrey

customer_reviews.title: Love Versace
customer_reviews.text: Great price when you cant decide which one is your favorite
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Great way to sample a very expensive product!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product as a Christmas gift for my mom. It was a great price for a Versace product. The length of the scent more than likely depends on the person.
customer_reviews.author: Jada Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Great option
customer_reviews.text: I don't use fragrances on a daily basis so the small bottles are nice because they don't go stale love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little gift set for myself
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little gift set for myself; Yellow Crystal is the best for me. Allows you to try without committing to a full bottle. Different scents for different moods. Sultry, classy, subtle and detectable without being too soft or overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: M. Colon

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Gifts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for Birthday presents. They both loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was gift to my daughter from my granddaughters. She really loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Mata Theodore

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: These are small bottle as advertised but its a great idea for samples for someone who loves this brand and also easy to carry in your purse.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but extremely small but good if you want to see how it smeels before you buy the big perfume.
customer_reviews.author: Kasie N.

customer_reviews.title: Not Versace
customer_reviews.text: All three smell like grandma's old Avon perfume bottles. Knock offs they all smell the same not Versace
customer_reviews.author: saw

product_meta.title: Versace Variety 3 Piece Mini Gift Set
product_meta.description: Size:3 Piece Setversace variety by versace Gift Set 0.17oz Crystal Noir EDT Splash| 0.17oz Bright Crystal EDT Splash| 0.17oz Yellow Diamond EDT Splash : Launched by design house of Versace in the year 2006. This floral fragrance has a blend of guava, white lilacs, jasmine, lotus flowers, orchid, azaleas, vetiver, cedarwood, and musk.
